title: How to Make Gluten Free Macaroons

steps.headline: Beat together the egg whites, sugar, and salt.
steps.description: Do this until the mixture is very frothy, about 3 to 4 minutes.

steps.headline: Stir in the vanilla, coconut flour and the coconut flakes.
Roll the mixture into tablespoon sized balls.
Drop onto a well greased, or parchment lined, baking sheet.
Bake 10 to 15 minutes or until they are golden brown.
Once cool, serve with dairy free ganache.
steps.description: Dip the bottoms of the macaroons carefully into the ganache. Place the macaroons chocolate side up on a large plate and refrigerate for 1 hour, or until they are set.

text: Preheat your oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Beat together the egg whites, sugar, and salt. Do this until the mixture is very frothy, about 3 to 4 minutes. Stir in the vanilla, coconut flour and the coconut flakes.  Roll the mixture into tablespoon sized balls.  Drop onto a well greased, or parchment lined, baking sheet.  Bake 10 to 15 minutes or until they are golden brown.  Cool.  Once cool, serve with dairy free ganache. Dip the bottoms of the macaroons carefully into the ganache. Place the macaroons chocolate side up on a large plate and refrigerate for 1 hour, or until they are set.
